scripts.start-nontransactional: cd test-system/WrapperApi && npm run start-services && cd ../../ &
scripts.stop-nontransactional: cd test-system/WrapperApi && npm run stop-services && cd ../../
scripts.start-transactional: cd test-system-transactional && npm run start-rabbitmq && npm run start-services && cd ../../ &
scripts.stop-transactional: cd test-system-transactional && npm run stop-rabbitmq && npm run stop-services && cd ../../
scripts.pretest: npm run start-nontransactional && npm run start-transactional
scripts.test-transactional: npm run start-transactional && sleep 20; node_modules/.bin/mocha test/scenarios-transactional.js
scripts.test-nontransactional: npm run start-nontransactional && sleep 20; node_modules/.bin/mocha test/scenarios-non-transactional.js
scripts.posttest: npm run stop-nontransactional && npm run stop-transactional
scripts.post-install: npm run install-wrapperApi && npm run install-jobApi && npm run install-eventApi
